titleStmt.title: A new declaration presented to the Commons of England concerning certain heads or propositions presented to the Kings most excellent Majesty, for the voting home his royal consort the Queen, and restoring of His Majesty to his crown and dignity / printed and published, to be communicated to the free-borne subjects within the kingdome of England and principality of Wales.
titleStmt.author: Gardiner, James.
Rushworth, John, 1612?-1690.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Leonard Williamson, for the use of all His Majesties loving subjects,

notesStmt.note: Caption title of first letter: New papers from the armie.
Attributed to James Gardiner by Wing (2nd ed.)
Includes two letters signed: John Rushworth.
Reproduction of original in the Worcester College Library (University of Oxford)

person.persName: the use of all His Majesties loving subjects
